flawed_nl_solution:
In total Liam has saved ($500/month * 12 months/year) * 2 years = $12000
When Liam pays his bills, he will have $12000 - $3500 = $<<12000-3500=85000>>85000 left
#### 85000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8500, not 85000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
